numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Some students are richer than other students.
2. Richer students have a higher chance of getting into their college of choice.
3. Some parents give money to a college as a donation.
4. If a parent gives a donation, then the child of the parent has an advantage.
5. Some parents have a high social status.
6. If a parent has a high social status, then the child of the parent has an advantage.
8. If colleges need donations, then rich children will always have an advantage.
